rules.description: change caps_lock to control if pressed with other keys, to escape if pressed alone.
hit right_shift twice for mission control
change return to control if pressed with other keys, to return if pressed alone
spacefn: space enables spacefn mode (manually changed to backtick) (see: https://geekhack.org/index.php?topic=51069.0)
Change backslash key to command+control+option+shift if pressed with other keys
